channel.title: Sqlite on LeosBits
channel.description: Recent content in Sqlite on LeosBits

item.title: Electron with SQLite
item.description: We want to build an Electron app with the ability to use Sqlite locally. First, we need to understand what we want. Electron is a framework (Formally ‘Atom Shell’) That is based on Chromium and the Node.js runtime. There are several ways to build the Electron app. Electron builder is one of them, and as you will see, the build process depends on the os and external libraries we will want to target.
